text_blurb: MONDO (Monarch Disease Ontology) is a comprehensive ontology for human diseases.

query_hints.reasoning_mode: no entailment; use explicit patterns and property paths (e.g., rdfs:subClassOf*)

query_patterns.axiom_annotated_synonym: ?class oboInOwl:hasExactSynonym ?syn . ?axiom a owl:Axiom ; owl:annotatedSource ?class ; owl:annotatedProperty oboInOwl:hasExactSynonym ; owl:annotatedTarget ?syn .
query_patterns.gene_association: ?class rdfs:subClassOf [ a owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty RO:0004003 ; owl:someValuesFrom ?gene ] .
